document_data.name: Droot
document_data.mainbody: '''Droot''' was a type of non-alcoholic beverage found in the Realms.{{Cite web/theedverse/2021-08-14 - The Boomgarden}}
document_data.Description: This beverage was made from nut and root distillates, much like the types that were usually added to bad [[beer]]s to make them more palatable. It was similar to [[Wikipedia:Root beer|root beer]],{{Cite dragon/167/Game Wizards: Understanding Undermountain|88}}
document_data.Availability: In [[Waterdeep]] this beverage was known to be sold at [[Mhaalauvur's]].
